price: Sie sagten: „Wer hat dies mit unseren Göttern getan? Er gehört wahrlich zu den Ungerechten.
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
